name: Sarah J.
quote: Zenafs has completely transformed my approach to work-life balance. The sessions are insightful and the platform is so easy to use.

name: Michael T.
quote: I was skeptical about online therapy, but the therapist matched with me was perfect. The video sessions feel just as personal as in-person.

name: Emily R.
quote: The journaling feature and mood tracking on the dashboard help me stay mindful between sessions. Highly recommend!
